about_Section.title: About MGNREGA Dashboard
about_Section.description1: The MGNREGA Dashboard is a data visualization platform built to present key insights about the implementation of the Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act (MGNREGA) in various districts of Uttar Pradesh.
about_Section.description2: This tool fetches real-time data from official government sources using open APIs and allows users to explore performance metrics such as total households worked, ongoing projects, and completed works.
about_Section.description3: The platform supports multiple languages, ensuring that citizens can access information in their preferred language, making it inclusive and accessible to all.
about_Section.note_text: This project is developed for educational and demonstration purposes and uses publicly available government data.

footer.about_text: The Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act (MGNREGA) aims to enhance livelihood security in rural areas by providing at least 100 days of wage employment every year to every household whose adult members volunteer to do unskilled manual work.
footer.contact_text: For more details, visit the official MGNREGA website or reach out to local authorities for district-level information.
